description: Transport your family to Jamaica with the flavours in this vibrant salad that teams jerk-spiced lamb with colourful veg and canned pineapple.
keywords: Salad,Seafood free,Bonus,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Sep 2021,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Jamaican Lamb Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red capsicum, halved, deseeded, thinly sliced
1 small red onion, halved, thinly sliced
425g canned pineapple slices in juice, drained, chopped
1 continental cucumber, halved lengthways, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk yoghurt, mustard, honey and vinegar in a small bowl. Season.
Combine spinach, capsicum, onion, pineapple, cucumber, avocado and lamb in a large bowl. Serve salad drizzled with dressing.
